question: Am I eligible to attend?
answer: To attend as a hacker, you need to be a high school student and between the ages of 13 and 18 years old. Unfortunately, we are unable to accept college students at this time. However, weâ€™ll greatly appreciate it if you can help out high school students by signing up to volunteer as a mentor! Additionally, you can consider attending HackUNT, a college hackathon organized on the same campus as hackTAMS!

question: When can I register?
answer: Registration will open in late summer and close several weeks before hackTAMS. Dates will be announced later.

question: How big can my team be?
answer: Team sizes can be 1-4 members. A team is not required to participate.

question: Do I have to pay to attend?
answer: Admission to hackTAMS is free! This includes food, shirts, stickers, WiFi, and more!

question: Where do I sleep?
answer: Hackers can go home for the night or sleep in our sleeping rooms separated by genders: male, female, and nonbinary. Please bring a sleeping bag or blankets if you wish to stay overnight.
